entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Embrace spans in System.Reflection.Metadata. #85280
  • [Documentation] Request update on the documentation of IL2026 #85274
  • IServiceCollection Configure should have an overload taking Func<TOptions> #85276
  • outerloop-nightly is broken because "native test components" is unavailable #85263
  • jitstress-random ComWrappersTestsBuiltInComDisabled is failing #85262
  • jitstress: BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd failing #85261
  • JitStress: System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.RSAKeyFileTests.UseAfterDispose(importKey: False) #85260
  • [8.0.100-preview.4.23223.1] IEnumerable<T>.Current throw System.InvalidOperationException when IEnumerable<T> collection is empty #85243
  • Function pointer type handles in shared code don't work #85240
    8.0.0
  • PATH=~/cmake/bin:$PATH ./build.sh clr+libs -c Release failed #85236
  • Test failure Interop\\MarshalAPI\\IUnknown\\IUnknownTest\\IUnknownTest.cmd #85234
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandlerFunctional.Tests.BidirectionStreamingTest.AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite #85233
    Future
  • SEHException (0x80004005): External component has thrown an exception #85231

Closed

  • NuGet ILAsm V5.0.0 /res: support is missing #48046
    Future
  • ILDasm crashes when dumping statistics for an invalid module #9668
    Future
  • Unnecessary LdelemaRef call not elided with Volatile.Read #65789
    8.0.0
  • PublishSingleFile=true + EventListener causes EventPipeEventDispatcher.DispatchEventsToEventListeners() to fully occupy a CPU core #80064
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Failing test ApplyUpdateTests.AsyncMethodChanges #79043
    8.0.0
  • [android] .NET 8 performance regression in System.Reflection.MethodInfo/ConstructorInfo.Invoke() #83893
    8.0.0
  • The JIT isn't optimizing `>>>` in the same way as `Vector128.ShiftRightLogical` on ARM #85257
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce TimeProvider extension method to create a CTS to be cancelled after a specified time period. #85080
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Hot Reload: Add support for updating generic methods #82791
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Hot reload: Add support for editing members of generic types #82792
    8.0.0
  • Optimizing a runtime-generated constant value #84094
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringSearch #78512
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Tune CSE/Constant propagation to fix this SIMD example #70657
    8.0.0
  • Requires on NativeAOT has problems with CompilerGeneratedCode #68786
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT doesnt produce Requires warnings in Generics #68688
    8.0.0
  • WASI app always tries to load icudt.dat from disk #84310
    8.0.0
  • System.Security.Principal.Windows nuget package has latest version 6.0.0-preview.5.21301.5 (last updated 15.06.2021) #85237

PullRequests

Created

  • [PERF] Add Android BenchmarkDotNet test #85282
    area-Infrastructure
  • Expose various Convert intrinsics for Avx512F, Avx512BW, and Avx512DQ #85281
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable Windows Arm64 ASMDIFFS between checked and release build #85279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix test execution jobs in the coreclr-release-outerloop-nightly pipeline #85278
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix perf regressions in Utf8Formatter for integers #85277
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Fix Avx2 helpers #85275
    needs-area-label
  • Build Mono LLVM legs on the CBL-Mariner images, but run the AOTing steps on CentOS Stream 8 with binutils #85273
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix edge case in stack overflow handling #85272
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging][native-library] If a dllimport is specified with an absolute path, look for it first #85271
    Servicing-consider, area-AssemblyLoader-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] [native-library] If a dllimport is specified with an absolute path, look for it first #85270
    Servicing-consider, area-AssemblyLoader-mono, 7.0.x
  • EnC Support for Generics #85269
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix the TimeProvider test #85268
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Avoid calling Encoding.GetBytes when Vector128 is not hardware accelerated #85267
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Improve Ascii (and Utf8) encoding #85266
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • JIT: improve profile update for loop inversion #85265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [mono] Add metadata update for overrides (backport #85182) #85259
    Servicing-consider, area-EnC-mono
  • [native-library] If a dllimport is specified with an absolute path, look for it first #85255
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • A bit faster version of indexing. WIP #85254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [mono] Remove mono_dl_open_runtime_lib() #85253
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Allow spill-at-single-def for pure defs #85251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Enable runtime tests for local aliasing on Mono Interpreter #85250
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Directory.Build.props: restore previous behavior when targetting 'other' TargetOSes from Windows. #85246
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` set flag in SDK #85245
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • JIT: Introduce GT_JTEST and clean up GT_JCMP flags #85242
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add aligned attribute for g_SyncBlockCacheInstance to avoid unaligned accessing error on some CPUs. #85241
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT ComWrappers: fix race condition in when creating native wrapper #85235
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Fixed regressions for `GT_NEG` containment #85230
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Pass resource item to workload task #85264
    needs-area-label
  • Add exceptions to TAR extended attribute constructors to disallow '=' and '\n' characters in keys and values. #82812
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • JIT: Move some BasicBlock methods into block.cpp #85224
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use double VectorTableLookup on ARM in ProbabilisticMap #85189
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • Skip covariant checks for ldelema T[] with T exact #85256
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Enable threads in Wasm SDK #85109
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add metadata update for overrides #85182
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Optimize >>> to ShiftRightLogical on arm64 #85258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Remove pipeline dependencies and steps for running Maui Mobile #85074
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Skip DllImportSearchPathsTest on wasm #84735
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-mono
  • Adding TimeProvider CreateCancellationTokenSource extension method #85131
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Fix superpmi.py to not cache local MCH files #85187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose AVX512 variants of AVX, AVX2, and FMA instructions #85228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests timeouts #85167
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add PackedSimd saturating integer arith. #85043
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] remove unneeded PKG_CONFIG_PATH for FreeBSD #84062
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono][debugger] Improving debugger functionaties #85050
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove unused code for PBKDF2 on Android #83639
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Special-case enums in Utf8.TryWrite handler #85196
    area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging][wasm][debugger] Remove error message when browser is closed #85062
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.18
  • Use emit-based invoke for all of WASM including DI #85065
    arch-wasm, area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [mono] refactor metadata update code #85177
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove common tests from the Roslyn3.11 test project. #85165
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix compiling errors within LoongArch64 and RISCV64 for `ins_Move_Extend`. #85216
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] fix the assertion error: 'numPlacedArgLocals < ArrLen(placedArgLocals)'. #85238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Almost complete sync of logic for generating DAM/RUC reflection access warnings between ILLink and NativeAOT #84770
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] implement ICU bundling #85049
    area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • Skip libs native runtime packages build in source-index-stage job #85239
    needs-area-label
  • [LoongArch64] fix the errors for mod/div after #82924. #85140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update ECMA-335 for function pointer changes #84962
    area-Meta

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] Use 8.1 atomics, if available, in RhpCheckedXchg/RhpCheckedLockCmpXchg #85283
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Transform indirect calls to direct ones in the importer #85197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Specify -z notext on linux-musl-x86 and riscv64 #83682
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Arm64] Replace pairs of `str` with `stp` #85032
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Parallel.ForAsync #84804
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation
  • AssemblyBuilder.Save add custom attributes handling. #84580
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add parsing error information to composite format string parsing exceptions #85106
    area-System.Runtime
  • Split assignment rationalization into a separate phase #85180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Simplifying access to thread static variables #84566
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add TextWriter.FlushAsync(CancellationToken) #84325
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Create a createdump static library for single-file dump generation #84864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix XUnit Log Fixer Irregularities #85183
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Support async JS interop on threadpool threads #84494
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • The ConstructorBuilder and MethodBuilder generated parameter should not has default value by default #84550
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • offers the synchronous part of start and stop in IHostedService to run concurrently #85191
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Fold IND(frozenObj, CNS) #85127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Ubuntu 22.10 kinetic kudu RIDs for .NET 7 #84984
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] amend the crossgen2/r2rdump for LA64. #85038
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Support some assignment decomposition in physical promotion #85105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable CS1591 for projects that don't use intellisense package XML file #84917
    bug, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocking-release, 8.0.0
  • Populating JSON properties support #83669
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] Port perfmap environment variable change to 6.0 #84681
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.18
  • Enable event pipe test in NativeAOT CI run #84891
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable ComWrappers for NativeAOT on non-Windows #85000
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Interface inheritance follow up #85117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [RISC-V][JIT] JIT/CodeGenBringUpTest #84748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use cinv instead of csel when possible #84926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix the reverse of genCodeForJumpCompare for LoongArch64 and RISCV64. #85217
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Change `callvirt` into `calli` for virtual delegates #83461
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo14::EnumerateNonGCObjects #85100
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add TargetHostName to QuicConnection #84976
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [mono][jit] Adding Vector128.ConvertXX as intrinsic on arm64. #85163
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix processing of x86 test results #82301
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't re-scan previously visited blocks in helperexpansion.cpp #85201
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • [HTTP/3] Stress hack for msquic dropping connections #84793
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono][NativeAOT] System.Globalization.Native build improvements #82393
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove presumably-useless? serializability checks #80957
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Making mono_inst_name less misleading #83570
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • fix(76268): Fix invalid behavior for ignored properties with "new" mo… #84756
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [mono] Handle Assert failure when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is invoked with VoidDelegate type #79530
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods on WASM. #82981
  • [mono][jit] Add Vector128.WithElement as intrinsic on arm64. #85158
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser] cleanup of early startup code #83411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix arg alignment issues when mixing with compiled code #85153
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [MONO] Add JIT_CODE_DEBUG_INFO record functionality for Jitdump #85107
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32 #85227
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: export for NativeAOT_StaticInitialization automatically #2259
  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Using together with .NET 8 SDK #2235

PullRequests

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to apr 15 #2255
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Wasm separate DWARF debug to different file #2264
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Export NativeAOT_StaticInitialization implicitly #2262

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build performance regression #32004
  • YouTube videos #31981

Closed

  • `dotnet workload uninstall` does not support verbosity flag #31684

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32009
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Nuget vulnerabilities output #32002
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • See what fails if we don't install the old runtimes #31997
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.12.3 to 19.13.0 in /eng/dependabot #31989
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Bump Verify.DiffPlex from 2.2.0 to 2.2.1 in /eng/dependabot #31988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Bump FakeItEasy from 7.3.1 to 7.4.0 in /eng/dependabot #31987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Bump FakeItEasy from 7.3.1 to 7.4.0 in /eng/dependabot #31986
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.12.1 to 19.13.0 in /eng/dependabot #31985
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • Bump Verify.DiffPlex from 2.2.0 to 2.2.1 in /eng/dependabot #31984
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • Adding support for additional auth scenarios for Zip Deploy #31983
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK

Merged

  • add artifacts path to buildprops template #32003
    untriaged, Area-Templates, Area-NetSDK
  • Adding support for additional auth scenarios for Zip Deploy #31999
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Update AOT console template #31980
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add verbosity option to workload uninstall command. #32005
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31956
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • dotnet sln: Add error message for misplaced solution argument #18608
    Area-CLI
  • #30336 Default Dotnet Tool to Run on Latest Runtime - Build time change #31957
    Review for breaking changes, untriaged, breaking-change, Area-Tools, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Change the workloads txt file name to KnownWorkloadManifests.txt. #31949
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] include container tasks and targets directly to `Microsoft.NET.Publish.Sdk` #31432
    Area-Containers
  • Change where to get latest .gitignore from #31965
    untriaged, Area-Common templates

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wrong caret position when moving to new line #67950
  • IDE0251 error in error list has no title #67949
  • `PENamedTypeSymbol.MakeDeclaredInterfaces` should check that the types are interfaces #67946
    Backlog
  • CI test failure: Roslyn.VisualStudio.NewIntegrationTests.VisualBasic.BasicArgumentProvider.SimpleTabTabCompletion #67945
  • IDE errors with file-local extension method #67940
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix a wrong text span usage in MergeIfStatementsCodeRefactoringProvider #67948
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add import completion option to LSP #67947
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve parsing of switch expressions whith missing `}` or `]` #67943
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Initial support for collection literal spread elements #67942
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC refactoring: ProjectBaseline, ProjectDiagnostics, PendingUpdate #67941
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

Merged

  • Add A/B option to test if disabling 'recoverable text' helps/hurts us #67845
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disable slow source generator 'JSImportGenerator' for Roslyn builds #67944
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • EnC: Implements support for generic type/method updates #67918
    Area-IDE, Interactive-EnC, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Use non-void type for `BoundAwaitOperator` in VB statement #67822
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, 17.7
  • Interceptors: handle duplicates, additional signature validation, etc. #67786
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Hard code segment constants for common type sizes #67921
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make EnC service a MEF service instead of a workspace service #67896
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Record added node output states as new #66725
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Do not return file-local type requested by unmangled metadata name #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Preserve removed entries in `SyntaxNodeProvider` #67636
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.7
  • Implement ISymbol.LocationList #67881
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Share common code involved into building dictionaries of members for namespace symbols #67933
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add `IsExplicitExtension` #67850
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Remove code lens cache to improve results returned #67884
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Flow the telemetry update change from feature branch to 17.2 release branch #67902
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the ` bool IsUnsafe(this TypeSymbol type)` method #67831
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Use correct ref-pack versions #67895
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Dev/dibarbet/17 3 servicing #67922
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid stack overflow due to deep recursion on long chain of calls. #67913
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection literals natural type #67364
  • Add a helper diagnostic for enforcing IDE0005 (remove unnecessary usi… #58835
    Area-IDE, 17.6
  • Add FilterSpan API to analyzer contexts #67818
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: https #47865
  • [Blazor] Analyzer to warn when using `required` or `init` on Blazor component properties #47864
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Should AllowedHosts be in the template appsettings.json? #47862
  • [QuickGrid] ColumnBase align check uses incorrect logical operator. #47857
  • API Proposal RoutingStateProvider; RouteData breaking change #47854
    8.0-preview4
  • SignalR android SDK add option to turn off the logs #47850

Closed

  • FabricBot aot rule test 4 #47872
  • Test 3 (ignore this issue) #47871
  • Test 1 (ignore this issue) #47867
  • Test 2 (ignore this issue) #47868
  • SystemTextJsonValidationMetadataProvider passes `null` values to the `JsonNamingPolicy` #47835
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #47848
  • The new FormInputRenderMode option adds unnecessary noise to query strings #47593
    Backlog
  • Documentation doesn't speak of required properties for Blazor parameters #47824
  • Allow to install BlazorWASM debug extension on VS Code on remote #47617
  • Add JSON file and UserSecrets configuration providers, and console logging w/ configuration to CreateSlimBuilder #47598
    8.0-preview4
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Blazor United: APIs for handling incoming form posts #46986
    8.0-preview4
  • Navlink and css isolation #47841
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter #47844

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixed bug in Sections #47870
    area-blazor
  • [release/7.0] Update Swashbuckle.AspNetCore (6.4.0 -> 6.5.0) #47861
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Update Swashbuckle.AspNetCore (6.2.3 -> 6.5.0) #47860
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Stop Calling JSON GetTypeInfo with the runtime type #47859
    area-web-frameworks
  • [blazor] Set Cross-Origin-Policy headers for multi-threaded runtime #47855
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview4
  • Change behavior of `<a href="#.."></a>` #47851
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Remove F# Worker AOT parameter. #47858
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview4
  • Remove the `empty milestone` condition from the AOT rule #47869
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Automatically label AOT related issues with NativeAOT label #47866
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix null property name handling logic in SystemTextJsonValidationMetadataProvider #47775
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview4
  • Update AOT friendly templates in reaction to SDK default changes & discussions #47847
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview4
  • Add default configuration and logging to CreateSlimBuilder #47797
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview4
  • Sync shared code from runtime #47833
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] Adds support for server side rendered forms (without a body) #47716
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Obsolete and replace ISystemClock in Security, Identity #47472 #47717
    breaking-change, area-security, needs-breaking-change-announcement
  • Update MessagePack version #47790
    area-signalr
  • Guard ILogger calls that do work at call site #47837
    needs-area-label
  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #47748
    area-signalr
  • Simplify and optimize async parameters in RequestDelegateFactory #42588
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • change 'ValuesController' to 'ValueController' #47474
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add analyzer/codefixer to use AddAuthorizationBuilder #47428
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Extend ControllerBase.Problem that can add extensions to ProblemDetails #47539

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Programmatically switching from left to right/right to left localization. #14755
  • Cursor Position set to beginning of Entry #14752
  • XmlSerializer iOS #14751
  • Crashing on Startup in Release on Physical Devices #14750
  • StackLayout HorizontalOptions & VerticalOptions do nothing. #14749
  • Evaluate stepper increment defaults for consistency and accessibility #14748
  • Setting CollectionView.ItemSizingStrategy to MeasureFirstItem causes StackLayout to not respond to content having IsVisible set to false #14746
  • MeasureOverride will be load many times #14745
  • [Android]Key pressed event not works in entry using handler #14744
  • Running all tests in Controls.DeviceTests on Windows fails with access violation #14742
    Backlog
  • [Bug] OnChildMeasureInvalidated Method is not triggered at runtime. #14741
    Backlog
  • ScrollView with VerticalStackLayout and dynamically added child controls incorrectly renders on Android platform (iOS OK). #14737
  • Use of Preferences class in .Net MAUI class library causes build failure with NU1202 error #14733
  • MAUI Blazor Project Publish Bug #14732
  • Can't center CollectionView within a VerticalLayout or StackLayout on iOS #14731
    Backlog

Closed

  • Safari browser development tools does not work for Blazor Hybrid 16.4 IOS/Mac Catalyst App #14736
  • Windows WebView2 ScriptDialogOpening CoreWebView2ScriptDialogOpeningEventArgsIt not functional #14717
  • [Bug] ICommandMapper and IPropertyMapper usage is very inconsistent #2204
    Backlog
  • Deployment of first tutorial failed #14743
  • DEP0700: Registration of the app failed. [0x80080204] error 0xC00CE014: App manifest validation error: The app manifest must be valid as per schema #14564
  • [Bug] OnChildMeasureInvalidated Method is not triggered at runtime. #3044
    Backlog
  • Initially selected item in CollectionView isn't highlighted on iOS #14730
  • Resizetizer rotates large images #6426
    Backlog
  • MAUI Blazor cannot switch Chinese input language #14593

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .Net 8 [Length] Attribute not supported #30754
  • Reconsider our default GUID generation strategy #30753
  • Dependents not deleted when severed from parent in optional relationship even with Delete Behavior Configured #30752
  • ValueConverters not considered with Sequence generators #30749
  • Inconsistent delete behavior when clearing a list #30748
  • Remove initial $ PathSegment from JsonScalarExpression/JsonQueryExpression #30747

Closed

  • Missing table column name information in Exceptions #30741
  • JSON/Sqlite: use `->` and `->>` where possible when traversing JSON, rather than `json_extract` #30334
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Disregard parameter names in `ExpressionEqualityComparer.GetHashCode` #30755

Merged

  • Use -> operator for SQLite JsonScalarExpression #30745

Updated

  • Support primitive collections #30738
  • Proposed fix to #7172 - Consider non-default column collation in table variable #29518
    waiting-for-response
  • Translate x.parse #28337
    waiting-for-response
